Detailed Description

Definition at line 8 of file Database.h.

Member Function Documentation

+ (Database *) db  

An implementation of the singleton pattern. This variable should only ever be set once after the very first request for the singleton object.

- (NSArray *) entriesWithNameContaining: (NSString *)  name  

Finds all the Entry objects containing the specified name in them. Intended to only be used when searching for entries by name. The sections variable must be accessed beforehand or this method will return an empty array on any input.

Definition at line 72 of file Database.m.

- (Entry *) entryFromIdentifier: (NSNumber *)  ident  

Finds an entry from a numeric identifier.

Definition at line 28 of file Database.m.

- (Section *) sectionFromIdentifier: (NSNumber *)  ident  

Finds a section from a numeric identifier. The sections variable does not need to be called first, as it will be loaded if necessary.

Definition at line 19 of file Database.m.

All sections in the database.
